banner.title: Elevated latency in one region
banner.body: Some users may notice slower responses. The service is still usable, but performance is below normal in a limited area.

customer_message: We’re seeing slower performance for a subset of users. We’ve reduced the impact and are continuing to monitor. Next update in 15 minutes.

services.name: Customer App
services.summary: Slower responses for some users in one region.

updates.text: Alert triggered for elevated delay. Confirming scope and impact.
Impact appears limited to one route. Traffic adjustments in progress.
Performance improving. Continuing watch for stability.
